recipesJson.name: Cheesecake Love - eJuice fairy
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
Soft cheesecake on top of a crispy graham crust with hints of strawberry and lemon
Sweetener not necessary but recommended to make it more desert authentic.

reviews.text: It is as promised, “Soft cheesecake on top of a crispy graham crust with hints of strawberry and lemon.” Also has a fairly prominent vanilla that wasn’t mentioned. But it tastes good, some I’m not really complaining. The strawberry and lemon are indeed just hints, like a small amount of lemon added to the cheesecake and maybe some strawberry puree added as well, or strawberry bits inside it, rather than a full-on strawberry topping. Has a lingering sweet finish that’s very nice, even without sweetener. This isn’t exactly what I personally want from a cheesecake, I’d prefer a heavy amount of a distinct topping, but it’s probably exactly what someone else wants, and I can’t find anything wrong with it. It’s a lighter, fluffier type of cheesecake but clearly a cheesecake, with a solid amount of crust, though the crust is a bit mixed in or emulsified, like a chewed up bite rather than tasting the layers separately, which also isn’t a bad, since that crust can lend itself to a drier finish if it’s separated while this is plenty moist throughout.
